duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct tax interviews with clients and support do-it-yourself online tax clients through virtual tools (i.e., video conferencing, phone, chat, email)
Generate business growth, increase client retention, and offer additional products and services
Communicate and coordinate regularly with leaders and peers about how remote work is impacting results
Grow tax expertise and inspire confidence in clients with the ability to communicate complex tax situations concisely via phone, email, and chat
Utilize effective customer service techniques and analytical skills to understand the client's needs

education_certification.credential: High school diploma / equivalent or higher
